description: This file defines a React component 'Board' that renders a 3x3 Tic Tac Toe game board. It manages the visual representation of the game grid, cell rendering with SVG icons for players ('X' as a knight and 'O' as a queen), handles cell click interactions, and highlights the winning line if provided.

methods.name: renderIcon
methods.description: Renders SVG icons for player marks ('X' as a knight, 'O' as a queen).
